# Moheshwar Amarnath Biswas's Personal Website

> Portfolio Website of Moheshwar Amarnath Biswas. A software developer from Bangladesh.

A personal website featuring his various projects and his blogs on technology.

## Main Sections

- [Blogs](https://fluentmoheshwar.pages.dev/posts/) - Various articles about technology.

## All Blog Articles

- [How to become self taught developer](https://fluentmoheshwar.pages.dev/posts/become-self-taught-developer/) - A article when he shares 21 key points to become a successful self taught developer. It was his personal note based on Sumit Saha's video.
- [Progressive Web Apps (PWA) কি, কেন, কিভাবে?](https://fluentmoheshwar.pages.dev/posts/pwa-ki/) - A bengali (bangla) article on Progressive Web Apps
- [How to make your shell look cooler](https://fluentmoheshwar.pages.dev/posts/shellsetup/) - A article where he shares a theme to customize your shell.
